text: Malabaril Ninnoru Manimaaran is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by Pappan.. ==Cast== *Jagadish as Balan *Jayaswathi as Meenu * Kalabhavan Mani as Sashankan *Jagathy Sreekumar as Unnithan *N. F. Varghese as Nelliparambu Sunny Varghese *Indrans * Kalpana as Chandrika *Bindu Panikker as Vasundara Devi *Narendra Prasad as Vasudevan Kartha *Paravoor Ramachandran as Nelliparambu Baby *Madhupal *Baiju *Subair *Sankaradi as Ramanunnithan *Mamukkoya as Abdulla *Salim Kumar as Omallur Omanakuttan *Spadikam George as Mathen Varghese *Sathaar as Gopalan Kartha *Kozhikode Narayanan Nair as Kunjunju ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Malabaril Ninnoru Manimaaran
